data.eml:eml: The first troglomorphic species of the millipede genus Paracortina Wang & Zhang, 1993 from south Yunnan, China (Diplopoda: Callipodida: Paracortinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stoev, Pavel (2004): The first troglomorphic species of the millipede genus Paracortina Wang & Zhang, 1993 from south Yunnan, China (Diplopoda: Callipodida: Paracortinidae). Zootaxa 441: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157918
